Name: Healing Word
Description: A divine light washes over you

Name: Lance of Faith
Description: A brilliant light sears through your foe

Name: Sacred Flame
Description: A sacred light shines from above searing your enemy

Name: Divine Glow
Description: You invoke a blast of white radiance from a holy symbol

Name: Cure Light Wounds
Description: You gain the power to instantly heal wounds

Name: Daunting Light
Description: A burining column of light engulfs your foe

Name: Spiritual Weapon
Description: You conjure a glowing weapon adorned with the symbol of your deity

Name: Cure Serious Wounds
Description: You gain the power to instantly heal wounds

Name: Break the Spirit
Description: Calling down the power of you god you bathe your fow in agonizing radiance

Name: Dire Radiance
Description: A shaft of brilliant cold starlight

Name: Eyebite
Description: You glare at your enemy and your eyes briefly gleam with brilliant colours.  Your foe reels under you mental assault

Name: Hellish Rebuke
Description: Your foe is scoured in hellish flames stoked by your own anger and pain

Name: Curse of the Dark Dream
Description: Inflict a waking nightmare

Name: Flames of Phlegethos
Description: Rivulets of clinging liquid fire appear and cascade over your target

Name: Diabolic Grasp
Description: A great talon of sulfurous darkness

Name: Dreadful Word
Description: You whisper one word of an unthinkable cosmic secret to your foe

Name: Vampiric Embrace
Description: A ribbon of twisting darkness streams from your hand to your target's heart

Name: Witchfire
Description: From the mystic energy of the Feywild you draw a brilliant white flame and set it in your enemy's mind and body

Name: Eldritch Blast
Description: A bolt of dark crackling eldricth energy

Name: Dread Star
Description: A fist-sized orb of painful blue-white radiance

Name: Fiery Bolt
Description: You call up a bolt of golden flame and hurl it at your foe

Name: Frigid Darkness
Description: You create a freezing black shadow around your foe

Name: Cloud of Daggers
Description: A small cloud of whirling daggers

Name: Magic Missile
Description: A silvery bolt of force

Name: Ray of Frost
Description: A blisteringly cold ray of white frost

Name: Scorching Burst
Description: A vertical column of golden flames

Name: Thunderwave
Description: You create a whip-crack of sonic power that lashes up from the ground

Name: Acid Arrow
Description: A shimmering arrow of green glowing liquid

Name: Flaming Sphere
Description: You conjure a rolling ball of fire and control where it goes

Name: Freezing Cloud
Description: A pellet shoots from your hand and exdplodes into a cloud of icy mist

Name: Burning Hands
Description: A fierce burst of flame from your hands

Name: Force Orb
Description: You hurl an orb of magical force at an enemy

Name: Icy Terrain
Description: With frosty breath you utter a single arcane work that creates a treacherous patch of ice

Name: Ray of Enfeeblement
Description: Weird green mist streams from your enemy's flesh carrying away its strength

Name: Chill Strike
Description: A bolt of frigid purple energy

Name: Color Spray
Description: A brilliant blast of lashing colours springs from your outstretched fingers knocking nearby enemies senseless

Name: Fire Shroud
Description: With a subtle gesture you wreathe nearby enemies in flames

Name: Fireball
Description: A globe of orange flame colaesces in your hand.  You hurl it at your enemies
